content:
DataContractSerializerOperationBehavior Class

Definition

Represents the run-time behavior of the DataContractSerializer.

In this Article

public class DataContractSerializerOperationBehavior : System.ServiceModel.Description.IOperationBehavior, System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension
Inheritance
System.Object
DataContractSerializerOperationBehavior

Inherited Members

Equals(Object)
Equals(Object,Object)
GetHashCode()
GetType()
MemberwiseClone()
ReferenceEquals(Object,Object)
ToString()

Remarks

The DataContractSerializerOperationBehavior enables the control of DataContractSerializer options, such as the MaxItemsInObjectGraph and IgnoreExtensionDataObject properties. Some of these properties can be set only using the constructor of the class. In that case, the DataContractSerializer can be replaced using the CreateSerializer method. For more information about data contracts, see Using Data Contracts.

For more information about using the DataContractSerializerOperationBehavior to replace the IDataContractSurrogate returned by the DataContractSurrogate property, see Data Contract Surrogates.

Constructors

DataContractSerializerOperationBehavior(OperationDescription)

Initializes a new instance of the DataContractSerializerOperationBehavior class with the specified operation description.

public DataContractSerializerOperationBehavior (System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription operation);
operation
OperationDescription

An OperationDescription that represents the operation.

DataContractSerializerOperationBehavior(OperationDescription,DataContractFormatAttribute)

Initializes a new instance of the DataContractSerializerOperationBehavior class with the specified operation description and data contract format.

public DataContractSerializerOperationBehavior (System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription operation, System.ServiceModel.DataContractFormatAttribute dataContractFormatAttribute);
operation
OperationDescription

An OperationDescription that represents the operation.

dataContractFormatAttribute
DataContractFormatAttribute

A DataContractFormatAttribute that is used to control the serialization process.

Properties

DataContractFormatAttribute

Gets the DataContractFormatAttribute associated with the operation.

public System.ServiceModel.DataContractFormatAttribute DataContractFormatAttribute { get; }
Value
DataContractFormatAttribute

The DataContractFormatAttribute associated with the operation.

DataContractResolver

Gets or sets an implementation of the DataContractResolver that is used to dynamically map types during serialization and deserialization processes.

public System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractResolver DataContractResolver { get; set; }
Value
DataContractResolver

Type: DataContractResolver

A class that maps an xsi:type to a known data contract type.

Remarks

For more information, see the DataContractResolver class document.

DataContractSurrogate

Gets or sets a surrogate to be used during the serialization and deserialization processes.

public System.Runtime.Serialization.IDataContractSurrogate DataContractSurrogate { get; set; }
Value
IDataContractSurrogate

An IDataContractSurrogate that is used as a substitute serializer.

IgnoreExtensionDataObject

Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the data provided by an extension of a type (and therefore not in the data contract) is ignored or not.

public bool IgnoreExtensionDataObject { get; set; }
Value
Boolean

true to ignore the data; otherwise, false.

Remarks

When set to true, the extra data is returned with any other serialized data. For more information, see the IExtensibleDataObject interface.

MaxItemsInObjectGraph

Gets or sets the maximum number of items in the object graph to serialize or deserialize.

public int MaxItemsInObjectGraph { get; set; }
Value
Int32

The maximum number of items in the object graph to serialize or deserialize. The default is Int32.

Methods

CreateSerializer(Type,String,String,IList<Type>)

Creates an instance of a class that inherits from XmlObjectSerializer for serialization and deserialization processes.

public virtual System.Runtime.Serialization.XmlObjectSerializer CreateSerializer (Type type, string name, string ns, System.Collections.Generic.IList<Type> knownTypes);
type
Type

The Type to create the serializer for.

name
String

The name of the generated type.

ns
String

The namespace of the generated type.

knownTypes
IList<Type>

An stem.Collections.Generic.IList`1 of Type that contains known types.

Returns
XmlObjectSerializer

An instance of a class that inherits from the XmlObjectSerializer class.

Remarks

Both the NetDataContractSerializer and the DataContractSerializer inherit from the XmlObjectSerializer class.

CreateSerializer(Type,XmlDictionaryString,XmlDictionaryString,IList<Type>)

Creates an instance of a class that inherits from XmlObjectSerializer for serialization and deserialization processes with an XmlDictionaryString that contains the namespace.

public virtual System.Runtime.Serialization.XmlObjectSerializer CreateSerializer (Type type, System.Xml.XmlDictionaryString name, System.Xml.XmlDictionaryString ns, System.Collections.Generic.IList<Type> knownTypes);
type
Type

The type to serialize or deserialize.

name
XmlDictionaryString

The name of the serialized type.

ns
XmlDictionaryString

An XmlDictionaryString that contains the namespace of the serialized type.

knownTypes
IList<Type>

An stem.Collections.Generic.IList`1 of Type that contains known types.

Returns
XmlObjectSerializer

An instance of a class that inherits from the XmlObjectSerializer class.

Remarks

Both the DataContractSerializer and the NetDataContractSerializer inherit from the XmlObjectSerializer class.

Explicit Interface Implementations

Adds a collection of parameters to the behavior.

void IOperationBehavior.AddBindingParameters (System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription description, System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingParameterCollection parameters);
description
OperationDescription

The OperationDescription to add the parameters to.

parameters
BindingParameterCollection

The BindingParameterCollection that contains the parameters to add.

IOperationBehavior.ApplyClientBehavior(OperationDescription,ClientOperation)

Attaches a client behavior to the operation.

void IOperationBehavior.ApplyClientBehavior (System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription description, System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ClientOperation proxy);
description
OperationDescription

The OperationDescription that represents the operation.

proxy
ClientOperation

A ClientOperation that represents a client.

IOperationBehavior.ApplyDispatchBehavior(OperationDescription,DispatchOperation)

Applies the behavior to the operation.

void IOperationBehavior.ApplyDispatchBehavior (System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription description, System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.DispatchOperation dispatch);
description
OperationDescription

An OperationDescription that represents the operation.

dispatch
DispatchOperation

The DispatchOperation to attach the behavior to.

IOperationBehavior.Validate(OperationDescription)

Validates the operation.

void IOperationBehavior.Validate (System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription description);
description
OperationDescription

An OperationDescription that represents the operation to validate.

IWsdlExportExtension.ExportContract(WsdlExporter,WsdlContractConversionContext)

Exports the WSDL representation of the operation.

void IWsdlExportExtension.ExportContract (System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter exporter, System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlContractConversionContext contractContext);
exporter
WsdlExporter

A WsdlExporter to use for the export.

contractContext
WsdlContractConversionContext

A WsdlContractConversionContext for the WSDL.

IWsdlExportExtension.ExportEndpoint(WsdlExporter,WsdlEndpointConversionContext)

Exports the endpoint description as a WSDL document.

void IWsdlExportExtension.ExportEndpoint (System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter exporter, System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext endpointContext);
exporter
WsdlExporter

A WsdlExporter to use for the export.

endpointContext
WsdlEndpointConversionContext

A WsdlEndpointConversionContext for the WSDL.
